articles.title: ChatGPT Unveils Its Limits: Principles of Law Deliver Checkmate
articles.description:
arXiv:2510.19261v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: This study examines the performance of ChatGPT with an experiment in the legal domain. We compare the outcome with it a baseline using regular expressions (Regex), rather than focusing solely on the assessment against human performance. articles.title: MSC-Bench: A Rigorous Benchmark for Multi-Server Tool Orchestration
articles.description:
arXiv:2510.19423v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: We introduce MSC-Bench, a large-scale benchmark for evaluating multi-hop, end-to-end tool orchestration by LLM agents in a hierarchical Model-Context Protocol (MCP) ecosystem. articles.title: Timely Clinical Diagnosis through Active Test Selection
articles.description:
arXiv:2510.18988v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: There is growing interest in using machine learning (ML) to support clinical diag- nosis, but most approaches rely on static, fully observed datasets and fail to reflect the sequential, resource-aware reasoning clinicians use in practice.
